title: GQ magazine headline font
content:
does anybody know what typeface GQ is now using on their department heads?  
they used to use Gotham, then moved to Foundry Gridnik, and now??  
thanks. They also use it on the cover heads.  
see example below:

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [009A\_restrict\_height\_600.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130314041021/http:/typophile.com/files/009A_restrict_height_600.jpg) | 93.31 KB |
author: ramonNYC

comments.content: Titling Gothic by Fontbureau says the [search](http://web.archive.org/web/20130314041021/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34734).
